desc: "The people of the sea sing that these crowns of pearls and coral will never be stained by any dirt."
in_play_description: For every 3 HP of healing your characters receive, this card accumulates 1 Sea-Dyed Foam. (Maximum of 2, Current healing received: ${[GCG_TOKEN_SHIELD]}) When this character deals DMG: Consume all Sea-Dyed Foam. DMG is increased by 1 for each one consumed.

skills.desc: For every 3 HP of healing your characters receive, this card accumulates 1 Sea-Dyed Foam. (Maximum of 2) When this character deals DMG: Consume all Sea-Dyed Foam. DMG is increased by 1 for each one consumed. (A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
